name: Bob and his mushrooms
description: 2D puzzle-based game that includes an adventure and survival theme. Bob's story begins on a certain planet in the solar system where intelligent life exists. Guide Bob through a maze to collect the delicious magic mushrooms that he and his family love so much. Each level will have a particular scenario that will include new ones and obstacles to face that will make it unique. To collect each of the magic mushrooms, you must move through the maze with stealth and caution, a bad move and Bob will pay for it with his life, be very careful !.
